txt.en: DNT
Instance: Blood for Blood
Talk to Herion
DNT
Defeat the Haradrim war-master and his men
DNT
Talk to Erchar
Fight through Linhir with Erchar and Herion to aid Garvir
Aid Garvir and defeat the invaders from Lebennin
<rgb=#FF0000>Erchar must not be defeated</rgb>
Erchar can be found in Linhir.\n\nErchar is fighting against the invaders in Linhir. You should aid him.
'It is a sorry day, [placeholder]. Let us tend to those we lost...'
DNT
'They are upon us, [placeholder]. We have held them thus far, but our lines are weakening.\n\n'Swiftly now, we must defend the gates!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Herion must not be defeated</rgb>
You see Herion overlooking the Gilrain nearby
'I think we have halted their assault, at least for the moment. My men here shall hold the line should they return.\n\n'We must go to Herion's aid at once.'
The captain can be found in Linhir.\n\nErchar is speaking with one of his captains. You should listen to the captain's report.
Erchar can be found in Linhir.\n\nThe Corsairs and Haradrim are attacking Linhir. You should speak to Erchar and defend the city.
Erchar can be found in Linhir.\n\nYou have broken the first assault and should now speak to Erchar.
Erchar can be found in Linhir.\n\nErchar is searching for Herion in Linhir. You should follow him.
The Corsairs and Haradrim make ready once more for battle at Linhir as the Heirs of Castamir seek to avenge their fallen.
Herion can be found in central Linhir, overlooking the Gilrain.\n\nYou have found Herion amidst the battle and should now speak to him.

'Brother! I am glad you both have come.

'Garvir and I were separated by a sudden rush of Haradrim through the east-gate. I was pushed back, and now all my men have fallen.

'I will not see him fight alone - we must reach him!'
Listen to the captain's report
Defend Linhir with Erchar
Erchar and Herion can be found in central Linhir.\n\nErchar and Herion are fighting their way through Linhir to reach Garvir.
Talk to Erchar
Garvir can be found on the ledge above the Gilrain.\n\nYou have found Garvir and should aid him before defeating the invaders.

The Haradrim war-master can be found near the ledge overlooking the Gilrain.\n\nGarvir has been killed by one of the Heirs of Castamir, who called his forces away. You should defeat the remaining men.
You have prevailed, but at great cost...
Erchar can be found in central Linhir.\n\nYou have defeated the invaders and beaten back the attack, but at great cost. You should speak to Erchar.
Aid Erchar in searching for Herion in Linhir
<rgb=#FF0000>Erchar has been defeated!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Herion has been defeated!</rgb>
DNT
DNT
Talk to Erchar
DNT
'Curse that man! Curse him and all of his inbred men!\n\n'I shall see him slain, [placeholder]. I swear this above all else!'
